page.title: 11HOME LIFE IN WILLINGDON
page.content: Average family size is two parents with two or three children. Few grandparents live with the family. Most children see them regularly apart from those living abroad. Childen stay with relations living far away. Those living locally are seen at weekends or holidaytime. Most children have at least one pet,dogs and cats being the most popular. Unusual pets include snakes,snails and stick insects. 67% of families eat a cooked meal every day. Despite trends towards health foods only 1% of homes are vegetarian,53% prefer wholemeal bread, 66% of this non-ethnic community enjoy ethnic foods. Cooking is by electricity or gas. Only 1% use solid fuel. 19% have microwaves also. Electrical gadgets are popular, especially processors.
